operation.descriptionCdata:
fdd9ee45-2adb-4802-aa77-730e5cd1b86e.description=This compares durations of two different pings. Used by the Ping Triangulation flow.

Inputs\:
threshold - What difference between ping times is considered similar.

Responses\:
similar - pings had similar duration.
different - pings had different durations.
failure - the operation failed.
operation.name: Compare durations

scriptlet.name: Operation Compare durations (d7e075f8-f7f3-4348-b3d1-a86f8bd78d4e)
